info: This gear will draw power from a bionic interface while worn, if one is available.
This gear is a component of power armor, and can't be worn on its own without a suit of power armor.
This gear allows wearing other components of power armor.
This gear, if worn, makes you a high-priority target in combat.
This gear is an add-on for power armor, and is not affected by power armor being powered or not.
This gear improves morale of spiritual people if worn.
